attributes.action: Add "None of the Above" to voting slips at elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You may remember it from Brewsters Millions, but in theory it's a great idea.
Too many protest votes are cast to parties that would otherwise receive little or no votes, by people who believe it is our duty to vote, when so many have died in wars to make sure we retain that right. However voters sometimes do not like any of the candidates and end up either spoiling their paper or voting for some radical or lesser party.
Really to do this is dishonouring our fallen heroes and we would like the right to make our vote heard and at the same time show our disapproval of the major candidates. Please allow us the chance to vote for "None of the above".
